MeydaOptions

Options for constructing a MeydaAnalyzer
Type:
  • Object
Properties:
Name Type Attributes Description
audioContext AudioContext The Audio Context for the MeydaAnalyzer to operate in.
source AudioNode The Audio Node for Meyda to listen to.
bufferSize number <optional>
 The size of the buffer.
hopSize number <optional>
 The hop size between buffers.
sampleRate number <optional>
 The number of samples per second in the audio context.
callback function <optional>
 A function to receive the frames of audio features
windowingFunction string <optional>
 The Windowing Function to apply to the signal before transformation to the frequency domain
featureExtractors string | Array.<string> <optional>
 Specify the feature extractors you want to run on the audio.
startImmediately boolean <optional>
 Pass `true` to start feature extraction immediately
Source:
  • main.js, line 6
